Mindcraft user guide


= PocketBook=

  * Current version of Mindcraft is using YOzFontM.TTF font. It can be downloaded from [http://yozvox.web.infoseek.co.jp/]. Manual font selection will be implemented soon.
  * Create "decks" subfolder in Mindcraft folder
  * Copy your decks to "decks" folder
  * Hold "UP" button to activate menu
